text: The Women's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships was held on March 12. ==Medalists== {| |- |width=200 valign=top|' Tatyana Levina Natalya Nazarova Olesya Forsheva Natalya Antyukh Yulia Gushchina* Tatyana Veshkurova* |width=200 valign=top|' Debbie Dunn Tiffany Williams Monica Hargrove Mary Wineberg Kia Davis* |width=200 valign=top|' Natallia Solohub Anna Kozak Yulyana Yushchanka Ilona Usovich |} * Runners who participated in the heats only and received medals. ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 2 teams of each heat (Q) plus the next 2 fastest (q) advance to the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
